querystring.select: SELECT lcpf.MONTHLY_INCOME_AMT AS MonthlyIncomeAmt, lcpf.MONTHLY_EXPENSE_AMT AS MonthlyExpenseAmt
querystring.from: FROM dbo.LEAD_CUST_PERSONAL_FIN_DATA lcpf join dbo.LEAD_CUST_PERSONAL lcp on lcpf.LEAD_CUST_PERSONAL_ID = lcp.LEAD_CUST_PERSONAL_ID join dbo.LEAD_CUST lc on lc.LEAD_CUST_ID = lcp.LEAD_CUST_ID
